Fimbria of hippocampus.EditorialNote: NeuroNames uses the preferred term "fimbria of hippocampus".  That is included here as a synonym (BB).  Note that many consider the fimbria to be separate from the fornix, but as they are continuous, I see no reason to keep them separate except for historical reasons (MM).
Fimbria of hippocampus.Definition: Part of fornix lying closest to the hippocampal formation continuos with the alveus.
